import "./style.css"; import * as Icon from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import { sendemail } from "./emailBehavior"; import { useState } from "react"; export const FormSendMail = () => { const [form, setform] = useState({ email: "", code: "", }); const handlechange = (event) =>{ setform({...form, [event.target.name]:event.target.v }) } return ( <>
); };
